content.query:
SELECT 
    YEAR(Fecha) AS 'AÃ±o',
    UPPER(D.RETAIL) AS 'RETAIL',
    RTRIM(SKU) AS 'COD_CADENA',
    NRO_LOCAL AS 'COD_LOCAL',
    UPPER(DATENAME(month, Fecha)) AS 'MES',
    DATEPART(week, Fecha) AS 'SEM',
    TRY_CAST(Unidades AS DECIMAL) * TRY_CAST(B.[PREC_UNITARIO] AS DECIMAL) AS 'VTA_PERIODO_NETA(S/)',
    Unidades AS 'VTA_PERIODO(U)',
    TRY_CAST(C.STOCK_CONTABLE AS DECIMAL) * TRY_CAST(C.[PU_CONTABLE] AS DECIMAL) AS 'INVENTARIO(S/)',
    C.STOCK_CONTABLE AS 'INVENTARIO(U)',
    Fecha
FROM 
    business.unidades01 A 
INNER JOIN 
    business.precio B ON A.[COD_REF] = B.[COD_REF] 
INNER JOIN 
    business.stock C ON A.[COD_REF] = C.[COD_REF]
INNER JOIN 
    business.TiendasRetail D ON A.NRO_LOCAL = D.COD_LOCAL
